Description:
The position description is a description of a particular position within YAZAKI Europe. It outlines the position's allocation in the organisational context, the general purpose of the position, the related responsibilities and required qualifications. All these characteristics are independent from the person holding the position.-Support daily production activities. 
-Participate in continuous improvement through the achieving excellence Efficiency.      
-Support Design team for preparing the standard work by operators
-Support production team by communicating the operators performance.
-Implement kaizen activities
-Reduce WIP
-Synchronize material flux with information flux (customer forcast)
-Prepare the capacity studies of all new projects.
-Define the work method.
